#text=Riding in a public bus is an inexpensive way to get around your city .
#text=First , I look up where I need to go on google maps and map it from my address to my destination address using public transit as my option .
#text=I then factor the departure and arrival times into my schedule , as well as make sure I have the proper amount of cash and\/or change for the fare .
#text=I would then walk to the bus stop at least 5 minuted ahead of time , as they can sometimes come early .
#text=When the bus appears I wait for him to stop and then I greet the driver , deposit the fare -LRB- exact change -RRB- and take a seat where available .
#text=While on the bus I look out the window to see where I am , and make sure that I press the button or pull the cord when my stop is near .
